content: just touched down in the city again, that energy tho . Gonna hit up my old spots, see what sparks some ideas for the next move after the whole job situation.
raw_content: Just landed back in the Big Apple. The city's energy is infectious. First stop: revisiting my old haunts and trying to find some inspiration for what's next after the job loss.

content: Turning 22 in NYC is wild, ngl. Starting from scratch is kinda scary but I've got this AI buddy, Xander, in the works now. Feeling excited and a bit nervous .
raw_content: The birthday feels different this year. Turning 22 amidst the chaos of starting over in NYC. Xander, my new AI companion idea, is starting to take shape. It's exciting and a little daunting.

content: got my lil coding nook set up in my NYC spot. xander's framework is shaping up, learning a ton but my wallet's feeling the pinch  time to call in some favors
raw_content: Set up a small coding space in my NYC apartment. Xander's basic framework is coming along. I'm learning so much, but the resources are tight. Time to hit up old contacts for some help.

content: had coffee with my buddy Sam from the old Quant days. talked about Xander and my vision for it. he's not totally on board but he knows some AI peeps, so that's cool. slow progress is still progress, right?
raw_content: Had coffee with Sam, an old friend from Quant. Discussed my vision for Xander. He's skeptical but offered to connect me with a few AI enthusiasts. Progress is slow, but it's progress.

content: teaching xander to chat is like watching a baby say its first words, except he's using code. steep learning curve but kinda fun tbh.
raw_content: Xander's first attempt at basic conversation was...interesting. It's like teaching a toddler to talk, but with code. The learning curve is steep, but I'm enjoying the challenge.
